profiles.name: Filesystem Server
profiles.description: Behavioral profile for @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem. Expects file read/write/list operations within configured directories.

profiles.name: Fetch Server
profiles.description: Behavioral profile for @modelcontextprotocol/server-fetch. Expects outbound HTTP requests to allowed domains.

profiles.name: Git Server
profiles.description: Behavioral profile for @modelcontextprotocol/server-git. Expects git operations within repository directories.

profiles.name: SQLite Server
profiles.description: Behavioral profile for @modelcontextprotocol/server-sqlite. Expects database read/write operations on .db/.sqlite files.

profiles.name: Brave Search Server
profiles.description: Behavioral profile for @anthropic/brave-search-server. Expects outbound HTTPS requests to Brave Search API.
